In triangle ABD

∠ADE =∠ABD +∠DAB
(exterior angle of triangle)

so, ∠ADE > ∠ABD

area of triangle ABD = area of triangle ADE

1/2 (AB)(BD)sin∠ABD = 
1/2 (AD)(DE)sin∠ADE

so, ABsin∠ABD = ADsin∠ADE

while 90° > ∠ADE > ∠ABD >0°
sin90°> sin∠ADE > sin∠ABD > sin0°
1> sin∠ADE > sin∠ABD > 0

so AB > AD

use the same method to triangle ACE, we can get AC > AE

so, AB + AC > AD + AE
